"Today in America, between 40 and 50 percent of all African-American

Our ruling

   Franks said, "Today in America, between 40 and 50 percent of all
   African-American babies, virtually 1-in-2 are killed before they are
   born."

But saying that "between 40 and 50 percent of all African-American babies"
   are aborted goes beyond the limits of the data.
